events.message: Customer reported a vehicle collision that occurred on 2024-04-30 at a busy intersection. Immediate filing of the claim to initiate processing.
The claim was reviewed and categorised under Auto Accident due to keywords indicating a car collision and damage.
An experienced agent was assigned to handle the claim and guide the customer through the process.
Customer received official acknowledgment of the claim along with instructions on next steps and supporting documents needed.
Request sent to customer for submission of accident photos, police report, and vehicle repair estimate for further processing.
Customer uploaded all requested documents including detailed photos of the vehicle damage and official police report.
Internal investigation commenced to verify the details of the collision and assess liability and damage extent.
Investigation concluded confirming accident details were consistent with customer report; claim eligible for settlement.
A settlement offer was prepared and sent to the customer covering repair costs and additional compensation for damages.
Customer acknowledged receipt of settlement proposal and expressed satisfaction with the prompt service and offer.
The claim was officially approved following customerâ€™s acceptance of the proposed settlement.
Final payment was transferred to the customer to cover vehicle repairs and additional related expenses.
The insurance claim was marked as closed following successful payment and confirmation of repair completion.
